forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
